author: minfrin
msg: Begin the process of optimising the parsing of Cache-Control headers. Parse
the incoming Cache-Control and Pragma headers once, instead of on each test.

author: pderop
msg: Added a new test case, which verifies that declaring extra dependencies from an init method,
and using the Component.add(List) signature works properly.

author: pderop
msg: Fetch again the current state in the add(List) method, just before invoking calculateStateChanges method.
